item.title: Re: the trade?
item.content:encoded: You can have 3 themes active at a time: one opening, one battle, and one ending. You set your themes on one day, and they become active on the next. So if you set "All Together Now" today, it'll be active tomorrow.

item.title: Re: the trade?
item.content:encoded:
Once you've made the Trade 2 (ie, the Note), you get all sorts of benefits. The biggest one is probably Note Rush (+20% AP/XP/Ryo for the day if you bingo someone). But the jutsu you can learn are great. Anon's obsessive insight is fantastic for #1 runs, and Right's jutsu is great for trying to push off looping while farming cash. LisaLisa also has a jutsu that lets you change your party without paying a stamina cost.

In addition, bingo'ing can also help with invasions.

item.title: Re: the trade?
item.content:encoded: If you're not planning on bingoing anyone then the Trade has less value, but in season 2 it gains a lot of utility beyond that. Firstly, you'll probably need it to meet the three bloodlines required for the Jonin exam. You'll also need it to get access to the Monochrome reaper missions, which require you to be immune to the Note. And finally you can use it to get a theme which makes you immune to the note and at gain at least one of three powerful jutsu. In season one, though, it's mainly for bingos.
